Mosaic is a special Display view that allows you to build custom page layouts. In order to use it, Mosaic must be enabled on a page.

  • First, navigate to the page where you want to use the Mosaic layout editor.
  • On the toolbar menu, click Display, then select Mosaic layout. 
     

When the Mosaic Layout is first enabled, the page will look very similar to before as if nothing has changed. Clicking the Edit tab now opens the Mosaic editor instead of the default Edit page form.
